contacts.title: Executive VP, Vice Dean & Chief Digital and Information Officer
contacts.relevance_notes: Chief Digital and Information Officer since 2020. Previously CIO since 2011. Direct owner of Epic EHR strategy and digital transformation. Featured in Becker's speaking about operational excellence and agentic AI for medical education.

contacts.title: Chief Medical Information Officer
contacts.relevance_notes: New CMIO as of December 2024. DO background with clinical informatics fellowship at Geisinger. Previously Senior Director of Digital Health at NYC Health + Hospitals. Key stakeholder for clinical training adoption.

contacts.title: Senior VP, Patient Care Services & Chief Nursing Officer
contacts.relevance_notes: CNO since 2020, previously at UChicago Medicine. DNP with extensive nursing leadership background at Cleveland Clinic. Key stakeholder for nursing documentation burden reduction and EHR training.

contacts.title: Vice President, MCIT Clinical Systems & Integration
contacts.relevance_notes: Led Epic Implementation & Design since 2009. Deep Epic expertise with 15+ years at NYU Langone. Direct owner of clinical systems integration - key technical stakeholder.

contact_summary.decision_maker_coverage: Strong - CIO/CDO, CMIO, CNO, VP Clinical Systems
contact_summary.recommended_entry_point: Nader Mherabi (CIO/CDO) - owns digital transformation and EHR strategy

discovery_notes: Excellent contact coverage with all key decision makers identified. Nader Mherabi is the primary target given his quotes on operational excellence and training innovation. Kenan Katranji is new to CMIO role (Dec 2024) - may be building relationships. CNO Deborah Albert owns nursing documentation burden initiatives.
